## Data handling
Alle Packete laden `library(tidyverse)` oder nur `library(tidyverse)`.


```{r}
dat <- iris %>% 
  as.tibble() %>% 
  filter(Sepal.Length > 5) %>% 
  group_by(Species) %>% 
  summarise(n = n(),
            mittel = mean(Petal.Length))
```
